name: Dashing Mariachis
storyline:
Run through the desert and avoid all obstacles to finally reach an old pueblo where someone awaits for your Serenata!
The player can choose between Tito (guitar), Pedro (violin), Juanito (trumpet) and Enrico (guitarron). These four mariachis feature different main tracks during the rhythm phase depending on their instruments. As the player runs through stages or plays Serenatas, he or she gains coins. These coins are used to hire Mariachis (your starting Mariachi is Tito), buy skins and get new instruments for each Mariachi. You get to play Dashing Mariachis in your own style!
summary:
Dashing Mariachis is a Mexican culture inspired game, situated in early 20th
century and heavily relying in Mariachi music with a subtle 8bit treatment, puts the player inside a 3D side-scrolling runner adventure with a gameplay shift at the ending of every stage where now the player has to hit musical notes accordingly in order to keep the Serenata (musical performance) running.
